title: Help Still Wanted at Small Firms
sub_head: The latest NFIB employment report finds another record-breaking month for raising wages.
body:
Omicron goes on and some fear that the robust recovery that began in mid-2020 may slow. But in January U.S. small businesses were more eager than ever to attract and retain employees, judging by another new high in the number of small firms lifting wages.
